name: Blackberry Cooler
description: Blackberries lend a pleasing sweet and tart flavor, and pretty color, to this nonalcoholic highball — and orgeat (a rich, almondy syrup) gives it some depth. Topped off with sparkling coconut water, it’s bright and refreshing.
keywords: blackberries, coconut water, lemon juice, lime juice, orgeat syrup
recipeIngredient: 4 or 5 blackberries (plus a few for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Vigorously shake citrus juices, orgeat and blackberries with ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with crushed ice. Top with sparkling coconut water. Garnish with blackberries and a sprig of rosemary.
